# The Keto Project Documentation Index

Keywords: keto certified, keto certification

## Canonical sources
PDF: source/pdf/the_keto_project_verification_guide_v1j26.pdf
Website: https://ketoverified.org

## Quick facts
Contact: hi@ketoverified.org
Mailing address: 6001 W Parmer Lane, Ste 370 #232, Austin, Texas USA

Net carb limits from the guide:
Meals 9 grams per serving
Snacks 5 grams per serving
Condiments 1 gram per serving
Other less than 10 percent carb content of total

Pricing is published on the website:
500 USD per year up to 5 UPCs, plus 100 USD per additional UPC, annual renewal

/docs/index.html
/docs/en/index.html
